name: Nerd Crossing
tagline: Our Business is Helping Your Business
description:
Nerd Crossing, Inc. is a Small Micro Business (SB) certified company with the State of California, National Certified as a Minority Business Enterprise (MBE) and Disadvantaged Business Certified with Department of Transportation (DBE). Nerd Crossing has an innovative approach to providing IT and Web consulting services and solutions to Federal, State, local agencies, commercial clients, and Systems Integrators.
We strongly believe in our vision to offer high quality information technology and software solutions that are individually catered to our clients.
